attributes.action: We would like a National Day of Prayer to be called against Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
On 23rd May 1940, King George VI called for a National Day of Prayer when the British troops were trapped at Dunkirk and God intervened for them in a miraculous way.
We request that the Queen ask the 'normal man in the street' to pray to God and ask for his deliverance from this terrible virus.
attributes.background: Request Her Majesty the Queen calls the Nation to a National Day of Prayer against the current pandemic.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.
